title: IMPLEMENT Crocks as the Official Sales/Operations Advisor for LID
body:
Proposal:
To promote Crocks from his current role as acting sales/operations advisor to official sales/operations advisor. 

Rationale:
Since the departure of Penn, Crocks has been fulfilling the role of sales/operations advisor to LID. Based on reports from other team members (Ty/Carl) and our recent new successful presales, Crocks has been doing an excellent job at the role. Making his new role official will help cement LID's sales/operations team. Furthermore, this promotion would be from within and rewarding a loyal member of LID's team which is good business practice and saves us from having to find a candidate from outside and taking the risk that they will perform well. 

Cost:
The sales/operations advisor role already has an allocation within our budget so this promotion does not incur any new costs for LID.

Implementation Time:
Crocks has already been fulfilling this role so there is no real adjustment time.
author: 0xB8aA505F812ab1dE4f67DdFD28cbAccae700ce9a
